name: The Executive Search Group, LLC
overview:
You need to find the best candidates - vetted, proven performers - cost effectively without wasting time. The Executive Search Group meets your need for high impact, cost effective hires using a methodology we call Hire with Certainty(SM) that results in search completion rates of almost 100%, and industry leading talent retention.

Why do Fortune 500 clients trust us? Because we’re authentic. We deliver. And we’re the only executive search firm that can help you hire with certainty – risk-free.

We take the time to find the right person, and help you bring aboard the leading talent using:

    * Executive Talent Acquisition Strategy
    * Hiring conditions analysis
    * Interview process management
    * Deep candidate fit analysis
    * Risk-free executive recruiting
